newsArray.title: T20 World Cup 2026: Did Gautam Gambhir Play a Role in Shubman Gill's Omission from India Squad?
newsArray.description: Shubman Gill, India’s Test and ODI captain, was shockingly left out of the T20 World Cup 2026 squad. While poor form and team balance were cited, reports point to limited communication and a key role of head coach Gautam Gambhir in the decision.
creator: hrishikesh damodar

newsArray.title: MI Emirates overpower Abu Dhabi Knight Riders to move second in ILT20
newsArray.description: article author: Arab NewsAuthor: Sat, 2025-12-20 19:48ABU DHABI: MI Emirates produced a commanding all-round display to register a 35-run victory over the Abu Dhabi Knight Riders at Zayed Cricket Stadium on Saturday, successfully defending a total of 187/4 in the first match of the day.A strong finish with the bat, followed by disciplined bowling through the middle overs, ensured MI Emirates tightened their grip on the contest and climbed to second place in the International League T20 points table.Main category: SportCricketTags: CricketT20 cricketUAEDP World ILT20MI EmiratesAbu Dhabi Knight Riders
creator: daniel.fountain

newsArray.title: IND vs PAK, U19 Asia Cup 2025 Final: अंडर 19 एशिया कप में पाकिस्तान के खिलाफ खिताबी मैच, 9वीं बार चैंपियन बनने पर भारत की निगाहें
newsArray.description: भले ही आयुष म्हात्रे और वैभव सूर्यवंशी लगातार अच्छा प्रदर्शन नहीं कर रहे हैं, लेकिन भारत इस बात से राहत महसूस कर सकता है कि दूसरे बल्लेबाज एरॉन जॉर्ज, विहान मल्होत्रा, वेदांत त्रिवेदी और अभिज्ञान कुंडू के बल्ले से रन आ रहे हैं. टीम को तेज गेंदबाज किशन सिंह और दीपेश देवेंद्रन का साथ मिल रहा है, जबकि स्पिनर खिलन पटेल और कनिष्क चौहान भी उनका साथ दे रहे हैं.
keywords: india u19 national cricket team vs pakistan u19 national cricket team match preview
india u19 national cricket team vs pakistan u19 national cricket team
creator: ians

newsArray.title: ای‌پي‌اېل دویم پړاو؛ د ۵ لوبډلو په ګډون به راتلونکي کال سپټمبر کې ترسره شي
newsArray.description: Afghanistan Premier League to Resume in 2026 After Seven-Year GapHayatullah.RahimiSun, 12/21/2025 - 01:16 Author sayed omer Sahar Sport After a seven-year hiatus, the Afghanistan Premier League (APL) is set to return in 2026, marking the league’s second season. This time, five teams will compete in the tournament.On Saturday, the Afghanistan Cricket Board (ACB) hosted a special ceremony in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, where they officially announced key details including the number of teams, the tournament schedule, and unveiled the league’s new logo.The event was attended by the Ambassador of the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan to the UAE, Mawlawi Badruddin, investors, members of the International and Asian Cricket Councils, officials from the Emirates Cricket Board, and players.During the ceremony, the ACB revealed that a ten-year agreement has been signed, ensuring that the APL will be held annually during the months of September and October.ACB CEO Naseeb Khan stated: “The second season of the APL, featuring five franchises, will be held in September 2026 in the UAE.”He explained that it took nearly three years to resolve issues from the inaugural season, establish a transparent procurement process, secure credible investors, and obtain legal stadium permissions in the UAE.He said that due to the 2025 World Cup, the Indian Premier League, and the extreme summer heat in the UAE, the APL has been scheduled for September 2026.The names of the five participating teams have not yet been announced. Each franchise’s full name will include both the company name and the team identity, which will be revealed at a later date.
creator: Omar.Sahar
